attributes.action: Fully close every hospitality establishment until safe from coronavirus
attributes.additional_details:
Restaurants take up a huge amount of jobs in the UK and if we dont shut them down during this epidemic businesses will start to shut their doors for good and thousands of chefs , waiting staff and bar workers will be put of jobs completely 

Insurance companies have no thought of paying a claim to a business unless their made to

It would be safer for workers and people who are still going to pubs after being told not to
attributes.background: Fully close any pub,  restaurant or other hospitality establishments during covid-19 period and ensure staff are paid

rejection.details:
Since this petition was created, the Government has announced that pubs, clubs and restaurants are to close. It has also asked everyone to stay at home. You can find out more here:  https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus

You can find out more about how to protect yourself and others from coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/
